song.title: Last Generation
song.info:
This song was composed specifically for 8-bit party Forever 2015, which earned the first place. This song is dedicated to all 8-bit enthusiasts and especially those who actively perform in the field of 8-bit machines ..... and for that I thank you all so much !! We are the team !!!!
Tech.Info.: --------------- - Platform: ZX Spectrum - Type of music: AY chip - Editor: Vortex Tracker - Stereo Format: ACB - Format for download: MP3 (10MB) - Year of publication: 2015
Caution !!! If it encounters you have any questions, comments or need any technical support, please contact me !!!
Thank you so much for listening !! Speccy rulezzz 4ever !! :-)
